alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 12:41AM MDT until May 30 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Northern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 141 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hartford to near Tea, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Tea around 145 AM CDT. Sioux Falls and Ellis around 150 AM CDT. Harrisburg, Crooks and Renner around 155 AM CDT. Lake Alvin State Recreation Area around 200 AM CDT. Brandon, Rowena and Corson around 205 AM CDT. Garretson, Valley Springs and Palisades State Park around 210 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern South Dakota.
